text:
For grins I ran JTidy on all of Ant's documentation.  There were quite a few 
errors reported - mostly with unescaped HTML in Javadoc comments.  Attached is 
a patch to correct.
creator: jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com

text:
The first patchfile (patchfile.txt) was glued manually together with cut-n-
paste because WinCVS wouldn't accept such a long command-line - maybe it pieced 
together incorrectly.  I've submitted three pieces replacing patchfile.txt - 
patchfile1.txt, patchfile2.txt, and patchfile3.txt, these should all be fine.
creator: jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
